snippet.title: Skelethrone: The Chronicles of Ericona - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Skelethrone: The Chronicles of Ericona is a challenging 2D action platformer with RPG elements inspired by games like Castlevania and Dark Souls.

Assume the role of Derek Ericona, a lord destined for death by treachery, who avoided it in favor of a more grim fate. You're in for a great adventure inspired by games like Castlevania and Dark Souls. Bloodthirsty monsters, divine creatures and epic boss battles. The game’s story is shaped by choices that will define your journey.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2139840/Skelethrone_The_Chronicles_of_Ericona/

#gaming #skelethrone #skelethronetheprey #xbox #nintendoswitch #pcgaming #metroidvania
